::Autofire::

Autofire nods, walking out of the room and then out of the base. 
Something was weird about how Megatron had dismissed the missing 
chip, but it didn't matter now.

Autofire transforms into vehicle mode, an enlongated sphere with 
engines in the back, and blasts off toward the Cybertronian Fire.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "hmmmm," Megatron says for show, "When Galvatron disapeared, the 
chips must
> have also disapeared," He said lying. "Good work Autofire, now, go 
learn as
> much as you can about the Maximal base, our first strike will 
involve them
> strongly.
